Articles.Content: Are they're any good light weight Starship/super heavy mods that add just that rocket with very minimal dependencies?

Check Tundra Exploration or Tundra Technologies (one is for SpaceX, the other is some smaller parts, I forget which is which). There's a thread for Tundra in the add-on release subforum.

I'm currently using an outdated version due to other mods having me locked into 1.7.3, but I think the mod maker has updated Tundra to reflect last year's Space X announcements and KSP 1.8.1.

1 hour ago, DeadJohn said:

Check Tundra Exploration or Tundra Technologies (one is for SpaceX, the other is some smaller parts, I forget which is which). There's a thread for Tundra in the add-on release subforum.

I'm currently using an outdated version due to other mods having me locked into 1.7.3, but I think the mod maker has updated Tundra to reflect last year's Space X announcements and KSP 1.8.1.

Cool Love his mod pack! Though I'm looking for something with out all the dependencies. Maybe even considering trying to make a stock rendition.
